name: janovrom.fire_simulation
description: Prototype for fire simulation with simple color/temperature rendering.

samples.description: Small fire simulation done on simple plane. Plants are placed in regular grid whose size can be configured. Simulation is running in a small grid as well. Total amount of plants is 1600.
Large fire simulation done on unity terrain. Plants are placed in a grid and jittered. Simulation is running in a larger grid. Total amount of plants is 40000.
Contains scene with UI controls that are hooked to the simulation using events.
